abstract: John A Catsimatidis, owner of Gristedes grocery store chain, and James L Dolan, who runs Cablevision and Madison Square Garden, have reportedly both made bids to buy financially troubled tabloid New York Daily News.
lead_paragraph: John A. Catsimatidis, the owner of Gristedes, and Cablevision, led by James L. Dolan, are said to have made bids to buy the newspaper.

headline.main: Daily News Said to Get Bids From Cablevision and Billionaire Grocer
headline.print_headline: Daily News Said to Draw Pair of Offers to Purchase It

snippet: John A. Catsimatidis, the owner of Gristedes, and Cablevision, led by James L. Dolan, are said to have made bids to buy the newspaper.
